import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link, Redirect, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import authService from '../../services/auth-service'; import { withAuthConsumer } from '../../contexts/AuthStore'; import { ButtonToolbar } from 'react-bootstrap'; class FooterNav extends Component { handleLogout = () => { authService.logout() .then( () => { this.props.onUserChanged({}) this.props.history.push('/login') }) } render() { const { user, isAuthenticated, isAdmin} = this.props; return(
{['up', 'down', 'left', 'right'].map(direction => ( Action Another action Something else here Separated link ))} {/* */}
{/* */}
) } } export default withRouter(withAuthConsumer(FooterNav)) ;
